about_the_game:
In AutoLand, you play as a little robot navigating through 24 levels, searching for the teleport while overcoming tricky obstacles. This unique one-button platformer features simple but engaging mechanics like jumping, wall jumping, and using power-ups to double jump or shoot bullets. As you progress, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges, including collecting keys to unlock lock blocks, riding on moving platforms, and avoiding deadly spikes.

Timing and persistence are key as you master each level’s unique challenges. With its minimalist pixel art and an original electronic soundtrack, AutoLand offers an enjoyable mix of precision and fun. Compete for the fastest times with your friends and the world, as your completion times are added to the online leaderboards after every level!

Key Features:

  • One-button gameplay: Jump, wall jump, and use power-ups like double jump and bullet shooting with just one button.

  • 24 levels of increasing difficulty: Face new obstacles like moving platforms, spikes, and lock blocks that require keys.

  • Power-ups: Collect items to unlock double jump and shooting abilities.

  • Simple yet charming pixel art: Retro-style visuals combined with an immersive original electronic soundtrack.

  • Online leaderboards: Compete globally by posting your best times after each completed level.

  • Achievements & cloud saves: Track your progress and save your game with full support for Steam features.

  • Gamepad support: Enjoy smooth gameplay with full gamepad compatibility.

Perfect for casual gamers looking for a quick, rewarding challenge, AutoLand blends classic platformer elements with modern design for a satisfying gameplay experience.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 148 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2.0 (desktop-amd64)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz x 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
  • Storage: 148 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: AutoLand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3450 @ 1.10GHz (cpu 2.2 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics (128 MB)
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel(R) Display Audio

short_description: You are a little robot moving and jumping through levels searching for the teleport. This is an one-button game with awesome pixel art and an impressive soundtrack.
